titleStmt.title: Sixteen sermons, preached on several subjects. By the most Reverend Dr. John Tillotson late Lord Arch-Bishop of Canterbury. Being the third volume; published from the originals, by Ralph Barker, D.D. chaplain to his Grace
titleStmt.author: Tillotson, John, 1630-1694.
Barker, Ralph, 1648-1708.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Ri. Chiswell, at the Rose and Crown in St. Paul's Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
